Name: Dive
Effect: Single Target. Charge Move. Out of Range while Charging. Vulnerable while charging to: Scald/ Surf/ Whirlpool/ Freeze-Dry/ Sheer Cold. Out of battle allows the Pokemon to move underwater carrying someone without risk of drowning.
Description: Just look at the world around you right here on the ocean floor, such wonderful things surround you. What more are you lookinâ€™ for?
